Articles.Content:
I just got this error thing.

![qTBaBb3.png](http://i.imgur.com/qTBaBb3.png)

Is it related to the recent maintenance? Or is it the HypeTrain rearing its ugly head already?
Happened twice for me now, a couple minutes apart.

Can confirm, am victim of database error. AMA!

Wait, wrong website. But yeah, this happened to me too...
Considering the timing I suspect this had to do with the generation of backups. Let me know if it happens again ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
